result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
result.translation: 42.Nabiyow Cus, malayka Maryamcy, Diggah Yalli isi taaqatah koo dooreeh uma taamoomii kee Wasaakatak koo Saytunnoyseh, ku- dabaanih Agabuk koo dooreeh koo muxxuseh Abba maleh Baxa xaltu Waytaamih Sabbatah malayka teetik itte waqdi.
